description:
Allows you to replace some parts of the string with others. 

This helper function returns a string in which all occurrences of 'find` in `data` are replaced with `replace`. 

Because the `helper.replace` helper returns a string, it can be used in properties that accept string values.
properties.data.description: Data to perform the replacement on.
properties.find.description: The value to search for â€” the string whose occurrences must be found in `data` and replaced with the string from `replace`.
properties.replace.description: The value to insert in place of the matches of the `find` value.
